text.en: Exalted Tārā, sole embodiment of the blessing and compassion
Of the three rare and sublime ones, the unfailing sources of refuge,
I humbly pay homage at your feet
text.en-trans: pakma nyerchik zhab la gü chak tsal

text.en: And those of your twenty-one emanations.
text.en-trans: dak sok di né tsé rab tamché du

text.en: From this very moment and in all lives to come
text.en-trans: pakma khyé kyi tsewé jezung té

text.en: Pray hold us in your great love.
text.en-trans: dak tong tö dang dren rek drowa kün

text.en: May all who see, hear, recall, or come into contact with me in any way, generate magnificent bodhicitta, most supreme,
text.en-trans: lab chen changchub sem chok gyü kyé né

text.en: And swiftly attain complete and perfect awakening.
